$-- Formulate the journal-id $if(citation.container-id)$ $for(citation.container-id)$ $if(citation.container-id.type)$ $citation.container-id.value$ $else$ $citation.container-id.value$ $endif$ $endfor$ $else$ $-- Fallback: an empty journal-id in case none is available.
$endif$
$-- Formulate the journal title
$if(citation.container-title)$ $citation.container-title$ $endif$ $if(citation.container-title-short)$ $citation.container-title-short$ $endif$
$if(citation.issn)$ $citation.issn$ $endif$ $if(citation.pissn)$ $citation.pissn$ $endif$ $if(citation.eissn)$ $citation.eissn$ $endif$ $-- At least one issn element is required; use empty issn as fallback $if(citation.issn)$ $elseif(citation.pissn)$ $elseif(citation.eissn)$ $else$
$endif$
$citation.publisher$ $if(citation.publisher-location)$ $citation.publisher-location$ $endif$
$endif$
$if(quarto-internal.jats-extended)$ $if(citation.article-id)$ $for(citation.article-id)$ $if(citation.article-id.type)$ $citation.article-id.value$ $else$ $citation.article-id.value$ $endif$ $endfor$ $endif$ $if(citation.doi)$ $citation.doi$ $endif$ $if(citation.pmid)$ $citation.pmid$ $endif$ $if(citation.pmcid)$ $citation.pmcid$ $endif$ $if(citation.art-access-id)$ $citation.art-access-id$ $endif$
$if(citation.subject)$
$citation.subject$ $if(citation.categories)$
$for(citation.categories)$ $citation.categories$ $endfor$
$endif$
$endif$ $endif$
$if(title)$
$title$ $if(subtitle)$ ${subtitle} $endif$
$endif$
${ authors.xml() }
$if(citation.issued)$ $if(citation.issued.date-parts/first/first)$$citation.issued.date-parts/first/first$$endif$ $if(citation.issued.date-parts/first/rest)$$citation.issued.date-parts/first/rest/first$$endif$ $if(citation.issued.date-parts/first/rest/rest)$$citation.issued.date-parts/first/rest/rest/first$ $endif$$endif$

$if(citation.first-page)$$citation.first-page$$endif$ $if(citation.last-page)$$citation.last-page$$endif$ $if(citation.elocation-id)$$citation.elocation-id$$endif$
$for(copyright.statement)$ $copyright.statement$ $endfor$ $for(copyright.year)$ $copyright.year$ $endfor$ $for(copyright.holder)$ $copyright.holder$ $endfor$

$endfor$ $for(funding.investigator)$

$endfor$
